long_description: Extensively updated to reflect new trends in wilderness recreation,. Written by the San Diego chapter of the Sierra Club; Editor: Kristi Anderson. Softcover; 318 pages; black-and-white photos, illustrations. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2013. Learn the basics for having a great time hiking, backpacking and camping. Covers all the basics, from planning a trip and selecting gear, to fitting a backpack, navigating in the wild and practicing first aid. New material includes tips for ultralight techniques and gear, conditioning and first aid, updated navigation with new GPS technology and expanded cooking section. .
short_description: Extensively updated to reflect new trends in wilderness recreation, Wilderness Basics explains wilderness ethics, navigation, trip planning, gear selection and meal planning in a clear format.
